alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Northern Stillwater; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 7 miles south of Ryegate, or 31 miles southeast of Harlowton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. Rainfall rates 3 to 5 inches an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized ponding or flooding. Be prepared for reduced visibility in heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Ryegate, Lavina and Franklin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
